zh:
<size=32>Rayashki is like a sparkling gem embedded into the permafrost.
 And above flies an eye-catching banner. 
Perhaps it will draw even more attention in the future.</size>
en:
<size=32>Rayashki is like a sparkling gem embedded into the permafrost.
 And above flies an eye-catching banner. 
Perhaps it will draw even more attention in the future.</size>

zh:
<size=32>Through the past decades, the citizens there have been trying
to achieve something different for themselves.</size>
en:
<size=32>Through the past decades, the citizens there have been trying
to achieve something different for themselves.</size>

zh:
<size=32>A great cause which may take the work of generations to
achieve.</size>
en:
<size=32>A great cause which may take the work of generations to
achieve.</size>

zh:
<size=32>But now they are no longer a nameless town in the far north, 
nor is their dream a passing fad bound to be forgotten.</size>
en:
<size=32>But now they are no longer a nameless town in the far north, 
nor is their dream a passing fad bound to be forgotten.</size>

zh: <size=32>I sincerely hope all of us will be able to witness its history and its future.</size>
en: <size=32>I sincerely hope all of us will be able to witness its history and its future.</size>

zh:
<size=32>That's why I knew I must write down this story.
In the hopes that their dream will remain in your heart 
forever.</size>
en:
<size=32>That's why I knew I must write down this story.
In the hopes that their dream will remain in your heart 
forever.</size>

zh: <size=40><color=#454545>“……因此，我不建议您回到现在的来亚什基。”</color></size>
en: <size=40><color=#454545>“……因此，我不建议您回到现在的来亚什基。”</color></size>

zh: <size=40><color=#454545>“这些就是我想告诉您的。我相信您是一个直面现实的人，不会做出鲁莽的决定，因此……”</color></size>
en: <size=40><color=#454545>“这些就是我想告诉您的。我相信您是一个直面现实的人，不会做出鲁莽的决定，因此……”</color></size>

zh: <size=40><color=#454545>“您一定是被部分所知，损害了看清全貌的能力。”</color></size>
en: <size=40><color=#454545>“您一定是被部分所知，损害了看清全貌的能力。”</color></size>

zh: <size=40><color=#454545>“……那已经不是您所知、且为之拼命和奋斗过的地方了。”</color></size>
en: <size=40><color=#454545>“……那已经不是您所知、且为之拼命和奋斗过的地方了。”</color></size>

zh: <size=40><color=#454545>“因为‘暴雨’，来亚什基的一切都改变了。”</color></size>
en: <size=40><color=#454545>“因为‘暴雨’，来亚什基的一切都改变了。”</color></size>

zh: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>如果以上所有礼仪，小姐都失败了，没有关系。</color></size>
en: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>如果以上所有礼仪，小姐都失败了，没有关系。</color></size>

zh: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>因为这世间有一条礼仪，在它面前，其他所有繁文缛节都相形见绌。</color></size>
en: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>因为这世间有一条礼仪，在它面前，其他所有繁文缛节都相形见绌。</color></size>

zh: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>而这条礼仪，小姐一出生就已经学会了。</color></size>
en: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>而这条礼仪，小姐一出生就已经学会了。</color></size>

zh: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>关爱他人，无论快乐或悲伤，被人误解或偶有愤怒，</color></size>
en: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>关爱他人，无论快乐或悲伤，被人误解或偶有愤怒，</color></size>

zh: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>永远不要停止关爱身边的任何人。</color></size>
en: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>永远不要停止关爱身边的任何人。</color></size>

zh: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>即便爱并不会让我们摆脱迈向死亡的命运，</color></size>
en: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>即便爱并不会让我们摆脱迈向死亡的命运，</color></size>

zh: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>但却可以让我们去想象一个没有孤独的永恒国度。</color></size>
en: <size=36><color=#FFFFFF>但却可以让我们去想象一个没有孤独的永恒国度。</color></size>

zh: <size=72><color=#FFFFFF>最绝望的险境不是多么危险的场景，而是内心的动摇</color></size>
en: <size=72><color=#FFFFFF>最绝望的险境不是多么危险的场景，而是内心的动摇</color></size>

zh:
<size=32>This country is renowned for its coffee and sugar. It is a land of beauty and bounty, treasures too often extorted. 
Whether by the princes of Europe and their donatários, or now by
the bankers and corporations.</size>
en:
<size=32>This country is renowned for its coffee and sugar. It is a land of beauty and bounty, treasures too often extorted. 
Whether by the princes of Europe and their donatários, or now by
the bankers and corporations.</size>

zh:
<size=32>Despite all the centuries of treasures extracted from the land,
desperation remains everywhere you look. 
It is a place where insurmountable wealth and the deepest
deprivations are neighbors—sometimes they lie only a street
across from one another.</size>
en:
<size=32>Despite all the centuries of treasures extracted from the land,
desperation remains everywhere you look. 
It is a place where insurmountable wealth and the deepest
deprivations are neighbors—sometimes they lie only a street
across from one another.</size>

zh:
<size=32>The multinationals have cut open the country's throat and now 
they drink it dry—</size>
en:
<size=32>The multinationals have cut open the country's throat and now 
they drink it dry—</size>

zh:
<size=32>leaving the people struggling with poverty and chaos. It is a 
bleak existence.</size>
en:
<size=32>leaving the people struggling with poverty and chaos. It is a 
bleak existence.</size>

zh:
<size=32>Dear readers, I share this with you so the story of these 
people might be heard.</size>
en:
<size=32>Dear readers, I share this with you so the story of these 
people might be heard.</size>

zh: <size=50><color=#FFFFFF>这只是一场简单的考核，不是去战场上送死。</color></size>
en: <size=50><color=#FFFFFF>这只是一场简单的考核，不是去战场上送死。</color></size>

zh: <size=72><color=#FFFFFF>嗯……因为你是无理数，才会被盯上的吧。</color></size>
en: <size=72><color=#FFFFFF>嗯……因为你是无理数，才会被盯上的吧。</color></size>
